snippet: The police said the suspect, the mother of a pupil in the teacher’s class, had been in treatment for “serious psychiatric problems.”
abstract: Mother of pupil at French preschool stabs teacher Fabienne Terral-Calmes to death in front of her class; attack draws outcry and calls for examination of teacher safety.
lead_paragraph: The police said the suspect, the mother of a pupil in the teacher’s class, had been in treatment for “serious psychiatric problems.”

headline.main: Preschool Teacher Is Stabbed to Death in Classroom in France
headline.print_headline: Teacher Stabbed to Death in Classroom in France
